mapper.select: {call PKG_REPORT.PROC_GET_FATM510(#{i_acct_grp, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{i_gubun, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{o_rc, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, javaType=java.sql.ResultSet, resultMap=test}) }

SELECT M510.gubn AS gubun, M510.acct_code AS acct_code, M510.code_expl AS code_expl, M510.use_yn AS use_yn, X200.acct_name AS acct_name, DECODE(M510.gubn, '1', '채권', '2', '채무') AS gubn_name FROM FATM510 M510, FATX200 X200 WHERE M510.acct_code = X200.acct_code AND X200.acct_grp = #{i_acct_grp} AND M510.Gubn = #{i_gubun} ORDER BY M510.acct_code
